```lean4
import Mathlib

open Nat Set MeasureTheory Topology Filter

/--
Let $a_1, \dots, a_{2n + 1}$ be a set of integers such that, if any one of them is removed, the remaining ones can be divided into two sets of $n$ integers with equal sums. Prove $a_1 = a_2 = \dots = a_{2n+1}$.
-/
theorem putnam_1973_b1
(n : ℕ)
(a : Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1) → ℤ)
(h_remove : ∀ S : Finset (Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1)), S.card = 2*n → ∃ T, T ⊆ S ∧ T.card = n ∧ ∑ i ∈ T, a i = ∑ i ∈ (S \ T), a i)
: ∀ i j : Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1), a i = a j :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_1973_b1
(n : ℕ)
(a : Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1) → ℤ)
(h_remove : ∀ S : Finset (Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1)), S.card = 2*n → ∃ T, T ⊆ S ∧ T.card = n ∧ ∑ i ∈ T, a i = ∑ i ∈ (S \ T), a i)
: ∀ i j : Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1), a i = a j := by
  intro i j
  have h₁ := h_remove (Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1)) (by simp)
  obtain ⟨T, hT_sub, hT_card, hT_sum⟩ := h₁
  have h₂ := h_remove (Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1) \ {i}) (by
    simp [Finset.card_sdiff, Finset.card_univ, Finset.Icc_eq_empty_of_lt]
    <;> omega)
  obtain ⟨T', hT'_sub, hT'_card, hT'_sum⟩ := h₂
  have h₃ := h_remove (Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1) \ {j}) (by
    simp [Finset.card_sdiff, Finset.card_univ, Finset.Icc_eq_empty_of_lt]
    <;> omega)
  obtain ⟨T'', hT''_sub, hT''_card, hT''_sum⟩ := h₃
  simp_all [Finset.sum_sdiff, Finset.card_univ, Finset.Icc_eq_empty_of_lt]
  <;> omega
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1973_b1
(n : ℕ)
(a : Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1) → ℤ)
(h_remove : ∀ S : Finset (Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1)), S.card = 2*n → ∃ T, T ⊆ S ∧ T.card = n ∧ ∑ i ∈ T, a i = ∑ i ∈ (S \ T), a i)
: ∀ i j : Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1), a i = a j := by
  have h1 := h_remove (Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1)) (by simp)
  obtain ⟨T, hT_sub, hT_card, hT_sum⟩ := h1
  have h2 := h_remove (∅ : Finset (Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1))) (by simp)
  obtain ⟨T', hT'_sub, hT'_card, hT'_sum⟩ := h2
  have h3 := h_remove (Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1) \ {Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1)} ) (by simp)
  obtain ⟨T'', hT''_sub, hT''_card, hT''_sum⟩ := h3
  simp_all [Finset.card_eq_zero]
  <;> aesop
```

(h_remove : ∀ S : Finset (Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1)), S.card = 2*n → ∃ T, T ⊆ S ∧ T.card = n ∧ ∑ i ∈ T, a i = ∑ i ∈ (S \ T), a i)
: ∀ i j : Finset.Icc 1 (2 * n + 1), a i = a j :=
sorry
